column4: maybe you have redundant songs, use audacious, it will give you exactly what you want, amarok as well
alright, and i know i have a few, but i know the onse getting repeated in shuffle don't have a redunancy
audacious and amarok then, anyway if you have about 20000+ songs, you don't want to hear you fave song playing again only after 6 weeks, do you?
